description: Variation of condition 2 of planning permission ref: 2023/01731/FUL granted 24th October 2024 for the 'Erection of a rear roof extension; erection of rear extensions at basement, ground and second floor levels; formation of roof terraces and retention of door opening in the front roofslope; installation of new rooflights in the front roofslope; installation of 8no solar panels above the roof of second floor rear back addition; installation of new windows to replace the existing windows to the rear and side elevations; installation of new doors to replace the existing windows at mezzanine floor level to the rear elevation; installation of a window to replace the existing door at first floor level to side elevation; removal of external staircase from the side of the building; formation of new rear lightwell openings at basement level; alterations to the shopfront to include the installation of new residential entrance door and new glazing to replace the existing; change of use of part of the basement and ground floor level from retail (Class E) into residential (Class C3), and change of use of the upper floor levels from HMO (Sui Generis) into residential (Class C3) in connection with the conversion of the mezzanine, first, second, third, part of basement and ground floor levels into 3 x 1-bedroom and 5 x 2-bedroom self-contained flats.' (Description amended via 2025/01321/NMAT). Amendments to allow additional roof terraces at upper ground and second floor levels and increase parapet wall height of single storey rear extension to form integrated terrace balustrade.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
decision_conditions: Solar PV Panels and Green Roof
